results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(0,0) = 1; T(n,k) = 3*T(n-1,k) - 2*T(n-2,k-1) for k = 0..floor(n/2); T(n,k)=0 for n or k < 0. Triangle of coefficients of Fermat polynomials.
comment: The numbers in rows of the triangle are along skew diagonals pointing top-right in center-justified triangle given in A303901 ((3-2x)^n).
Row n gives coefficients of Fermat polynomial.
The coefficients in the expansion of 1/(1-3x+2x^2) are given by the sequence generated by the row sums.
reference: Shara Lalo and Zagros Lalo, Polynomial Expansion Theorems and Number Triangles, Zana Publishing, 2018, ISBN: 978-1-9995914-0-3, pp. 70, 104, 394, 395.
program: tabf(nn) = for (n=0, nn, for (k=0, n\2, print1(T(n,k), ", ")); print); \\ _Michel Marcus_, May 10 2018
